name: InfectiousConditions
title: Infectious conditions
description: OP-8 is the measure ID associated with the codes.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains ICD-9 codes associated with infectious conditions.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have an infectious condition.),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD-9 codes associated with infectious conditions, such as Meningitis, Tuberculous, Syphilis are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Non-infectious diseases are excluded from the value set.)
